name: Icon Gradients
description: Allows u to gradient ur icons.

flip-2p.name: Flip Second Player Colors
flip-2p.description: Flip colors for second player like vanilla gd does.

separate-2p.name: Separate Second Player Gradient
separate-2p.description: Makes the second player use a separate set of gradients.

disable-2p.name: Disable Second Player Gradient
disable-2p.description: Makes second player not have gradient.

menu-gradients.name: Gradients in Menu
menu-gradients.description: Makes players in the main menu have your gradients.

hide-on-move.name: Hide Points on Move
hide-on-move.description: Hides all points when moving one

point-opacity.name: Point Opacity
point-opacity.description: The opacity the points will be when not hidden (0 - 255).

point-scale.name: Point Scale
point-scale.description: The scale the points will have.

move-step.name: Move step length
move-step.description: How much the points are going to move then using arrow keys.

preload-shaders.name: Preload Shaders
preload-shaders.description: Preloads shaders on game open to prevent lagspikes mid gameplay.
